subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Whistling Straits, built on land that was once a military camp, was once viewed as bizarre, but its layout (and others like it) may be seen more frequently at major golf tournaments.
snippet: Whistling Straits, built on land that was once a military camp, was once viewed as bizarre, but its layout (and others like it) may be seen more frequently at major golf tournaments.
